required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Modified Connective Tissue Graft Wall With Wing Technique for Posterior Teeth
clinical_study.official_title: Modified Connective Tissue Graft Wall With Wing Technique for Posterior Teeth in Treating One Wall Vertical Bone Defects With Class III Gingival Recession: A 12 Months Follow up

collaborator.agency: October University for Modern Sciences and Arts

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators reported here the application of usage modified connective tissue graft wall technique for posterior teeth. The treatment outcomes suggested the efficacy of the used technique in treating recession defects accompanied by infrabony defects in molars.

detailed_description.textblock: Gingival recession is defined as the apical migration of the gingival margin leaving the root surface denuded. Treatment of Class III and IV defects and achievement good of results seems to be quite difficult due to the advanced loss of the soft and hard tissues supporting the affected teeth. Furthermore, partial to total loss of the interproximal papilla is one of the main challenges that contribute for achieving higher levels of esthetics especially in anterior zone. In such a case, conventional techniques of root coverage results usually in poor prognosis.

primary_outcome.description: measurment of recession defect depth and width

arm_group.description: peridoontal regeneration using bone graft and collagen barrier as treatment of vertical bony defects with recession defect

arm_group.arm_group_label: Modified connective tissue graft wall with wing technique
arm_group.description: peridoontal regeneration using bone graft and modified connective tissue graft wall with wing as treatment of vertical bony defects with recession defect

intervention.intervention_name: Modified connective tissue graft wall with wing technique
intervention.description: the usage of bone graft and collagen barrier to treat recession defects accompanied vertical bony defcets in posterior teeth
intervention.arm_group_label: Modified connective tissue graft wall with wing technique

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- recession defects in posterior teeth
- vertical infrabony defects in relation to the same recession defect
Exclusion Criteria:
- smokers
- suystemic diseases
- pregnency and lactating mothers

facility.name: Octobar University of Modern Sciences and Arts

clinical_study.keyword: modified connective tissue wall technique with a wing
